dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT (CASE WHEN (SELECT qrk1.remark_text FROM quote_remark qrk1 WHERE qrk1.quote_gid = q.quote_gid AND qrk1.remark_qualifier_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.QUOTE EXTERNAL NOTES') IS NULL THEN (SELECT qr1.quote_refnum_value FROM quote_refnum qr1 WHERE qr1.quote_gid = q.quote_gid AND qr1.quote_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.QUOTE EXTERNAL NOTES') ELSE (SELECT qrk1.remark_text FROM quote_remark qrk1 WHERE qrk1.quote_gid = q.quote_gid AND qrk1.remark_qualifier_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.QUOTE EXTERNAL NOTES') END) notes, (CASE WHEN qref.quote_refnum_value = 'NRA' THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END) nra_yes_no, (CASE WHEN lc2.location_name IS NULL THEN q.attribute11 ELSE lc2.location_name END) company_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(loc1.location_gid) company_address, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(loc1.location_gid) company_city_state_zip, TRIM(con3.first_name || ' ' || con3.last_name) manager_contact, con3.company_name manager_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(loc3.location_gid) manager_address, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(loc3.location_gid) manager_city_state_zip, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT SUM(qcosc1.cost) FROM quote_cost_option_ship_cost qcosc1 INNER JOIN quote_cost_option_shipment qcos1 ON qcosc1.quote_gid = qcos1.quote_gid AND qcosc1.cost_option_sequence = qcos1.cost_option_sequence AND qcosc1.shipment_sequence = qcos1.shipment_sequence AND qcos1.perspective = 'S' WHERE qcos1.quote_gid = q.quote_gid AND NOT NVL(qcos1.shipment_type_gid,'XXYYZZYYXX') = 'NON FREIGHT RELATED CHARGE' AND qcosc1.cost_type = 'B' AND qcos1.cost_option_sequence = 0),'$999,999,990.00')) sell_price, (CASE WHEN (SELECT equipment_group_name FROM equipment_group eg INNER JOIN quote_equipment_group qeg ON eg.equipment_group_gid = qeg.equipment_group_gid WHERE qeg.quote_gid = q.quote_gid) IS NULL THEN (SELECT eg.equipment_group_name FROM equipment_group eg INNER JOIN equipment_type_join etj ON eg.equipment_group_gid = etj.equipment_group_gid INNER JOIN quote_ship_unit qsu ON etj.equipment_type_gid = qsu.transport_handling_unit_gid WHERE qsu.quote_gid = q.quote_gid) ELSE (SELECT equipment_group_name FROM equipment_group eg INNER JOIN quote_equipment_group qeg ON eg.equipment_group_gid = qeg.equipment_group_gid WHERE qeg.quote_gid = q.quote_gid) END) equip, l1.city || ', ' || l1.province_code origin, l2.city || ', ' || l2.province_code || ' ' || l2.country_code3_gid destination, (CASE WHEN NOT lc1.location_name IS NULL THEN 'with ' || lc1.location_name || ' ' ELSE '' END) carrier, qrnum.quote_refnum_value commod, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(q.expiration_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YY') expire_date, q.quote_xid quote_num, (CASE WHEN lc2.location_name IS NULL THEN q.attribute11 ELSE lc2.location_name END) cust_name FROM quote q LEFT OUTER JOIN quote_refnum qr ON q.quote_gid = qr.quote_gid AND qr.quote_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.IMPORT_EXPORT' LEFT OUTER JOIN quote_refnum qref ON q.quote_gid = qref.quote_gid AND qref.quote_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.NRA' LEFT OUTER JOIN quote_involved_party qip1 ON q.quote_gid = qip1.quote_gid AND qip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON qip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location lc2 ON con1.location_gid = lc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON con1.location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code ccode1 ON loc1.country_code3_gid = ccode1.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN quote_involved_party qip3 ON q.quote_gid = qip3.quote_gid AND qip3.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVO.QUOTE MANAGER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con3 ON qip3.involved_party_contact_gid = con3.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON con3.location_gid = loc3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN country_code ccode3 ON loc3.country_code3_gid = ccode3.country_code3_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l1 ON q.origin_location_gid = l1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l2 ON q.destination_location_gid = l2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN quote_cost_option_shipment qcos ON q.quote_gid = qcos.quote_gid AND qcos.is_primary = 'Y' AND qcos.perspective = 'B' AND qcos.cost_option_sequence = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN location lc1 ON qcos.servprov_gid = lc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN quote_refnum qrnum ON q.quote_gid = qrnum.quote_gid AND qrnum.quote_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.ITEM DESCRIPTION' WHERE q.quote_gid = :QTE_ID

SELECT DISTINCT q.quote_xid || '-' || qco.cost_option_sequence quote_no, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YY') system_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(q.expiration_date,'dd-mm-rr'),'fmMM/DD/YY') expiration_date, (CASE WHEN lc2.location_name IS NULL THEN q.attribute11 ELSE lc2.location_name END) customer_name, qrnum.quote_refnum_value commodity, l1.city || ', ' || l1.province_code origin_location, l2.city || ', ' || l2.province_code || ' ' || l2.country_code3_gid destination_location, loc1.location_name carrier_name, (CASE WHEN (SELECT equipment_group_name FROM equipment_group eg INNER JOIN quote_equipment_group qeg ON eg.equipment_group_gid = qeg.equipment_group_gid WHERE qeg.quote_gid = q.quote_gid) IS NULL THEN (SELECT eg.equipment_group_name FROM equipment_group eg INNER JOIN equipment_type_join etj ON eg.equipment_group_gid = etj.equipment_group_gid INNER JOIN quote_ship_unit qsu ON etj.equipment_type_gid = qsu.transport_handling_unit_gid WHERE qsu.quote_gid = q.quote_gid) ELSE (SELECT equipment_group_name FROM equipment_group eg INNER JOIN quote_equipment_group qeg ON eg.equipment_group_gid = qeg.equipment_group_gid WHERE qeg.quote_gid = q.quote_gid) END) equipment, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT SUM(qcosc1.cost) FROM quote_cost_option_ship_cost qcosc1 INNER JOIN quote_cost_option_shipment qcos1 ON qcosc1.quote_gid = qcos1.quote_gid AND qcosc1.cost_option_sequence = qcos1.cost_option_sequence AND qcosc1.shipment_sequence = qcos1.shipment_sequence AND qcos1.perspective = 'S' WHERE qcos1.quote_gid = qco.quote_gid AND NOT NVL(qcos1.shipment_type_gid,'XXYYZZYYXX') = 'NON FREIGHT RELATED CHARGE' AND qcosc1.cost_type = 'B' AND qcos1.cost_option_sequence = qco.cost_option_sequence),'$999,999,990.00')) price_cost FROM quote q LEFT OUTER JOIN quote_cost_option qco ON q.quote_gid = qco.quote_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN quote_cost_option_shipment qcos ON q.quote_gid = qcos.quote_gid AND qcos.is_primary = 'Y' AND qcos.perspective = 'B' AND qcos.cost_option_sequence = qco.cost_option_sequence LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON qcos.servprov_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN quote_refnum qr ON q.quote_gid = qr.quote_gid AND qr.quote_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.IMPORT_EXPORT' LEFT OUTER JOIN quote_involved_party qip1 ON q.quote_gid = qip1.quote_gid AND qip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BILL-TO' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON qip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location lc2 ON con1.contact_gid = lc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN quote_ship_unit qsu ON qco.quote_gid = qsu.quote_gid AND qsu.sequence = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ship_unit_spec sus ON qsu.transport_handling_unit_gid = sus.ship_unit_spec_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l1 ON q.origin_location_gid = l1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l2 ON q.destination_location_gid = l2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN quote_refnum qrnum ON q.quote_gid = qrnum.quote_gid AND qrnum.quote_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.ITEM DESCRIPTION' WHERE q.quote_gid = :QTE_ID AND qco.cost_option_sequence = 0 ORDER BY qco.cost_option_sequence ASC
